EmailTemplate.description: Email notification of contract expiration in 365 days
EmailTemplate.name: Notice of upcoming contract expiration
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Customers Contract is coming up for renewal.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Your Customers Contract is coming up for renewal. This is not an auto-renewal contract. A task was assigned to {!Account.OwnerFullName} to create a new opportunity to manage this renewal.‚Äù Account Name: {!Account.Name} Master Customer Number: {!Account.Master_Customer_Number__c} Contract End Date: {!Account.Pramata_AggTerm_End_Date__c} Link to Account: {!Account.Link}
